WorkItem.ClosedComment: Look through the last couple of menus for a "Reset All Caches" option. This will force a new download of all the XML files to your local Silverlight cache and you will then see filters, items, etc.
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
Let me say that rawr3 looks so much cooler than rawr2 and thanks for developing it.
 
How ever i could not find any explanation or solution to see recommended upgrades for my gear.
The item filter is simply empty and no items are offered me only show my current item.
 
Also i try to add custom item filter, but no items anyway.
 
I have latest build of rawr3 b3.0.3.21
 
Is it supposed to be like that or i miss something ? In rawr2 as you load up your character you can see all items for upgrade, but here i simply have nothing.
 
Thanks.
